It's a fun game to play when you get bored by playing other games, and I always wanted to get this game when it first came out on steam

You know that one kid during tag who would always go for tag-backs or run towards the slowest kid or call "timeout" right before you caught them? Now you can play a game where you play as that kid.

This game is really fun but it has a massive hacker problem. I reported two of them WITH A VIDEO and I was really disappointed with the response. 

For some reason this game doesn't seem to have basic anti-cheat checks. You can be perma-stunned as a killer, insta-gibbed as a survivor, or just frozen in place forever.

One of the best coop games I`ve ever played with friends.
Great variety of characters on both sides with a huge pallete of perks that can be combined with eachother,
Some are bad some are good and some are really good. The selection of maps is also great with great detail.
Never really felt like that the game was unbalanced.
The problem this game has is that you really need to play long to get characters. I`ve only unlocked one character and never bought any cosmetics and perks, Adventcalender Iredecent shards included. 
You probably need 70 or so hours of online playtime to unlock one character.
Some characters and killers can`t even be unlocked with Iredecent shards (licenced dlcs), so you need to spend ~5‚Ç¨ (50% off on sales) to unlock them. The biggest problem with licenced dlcs is that the perks are really good. 
You really need to spend a few bucks or grind your ass of tho unlock characters. Thats in my eyes the biggest problem i have with the game.
But on the other side it is really fun with friends. I can recommend it.
The Line Between Pain And Pleasure Is Blurred Here

Pros:
Fun to play with friends
Fun to chase people
Cons:
Is a rage game
Too grindy
No sex

Excellent game. Would recommend to anyone who likes a fast paced horror/action game.

Dead By Daylight was a game I thoroughly enjoyed playing. The interesting killer aesthetics, the multitude of maps, replay ability, customizable loadouts, a surprisingly in-depth chase cycle, etc. It was an amazing experience, learning the ins and outs of the game, improving every game as there was more and more to learn about it, seemingly endless. The positives of the game are clear and shown on the front page. 

The game now, is a piece of trash, undeserving of you, OR your friends' 20 dollars. There is nearly no reason to play DBD anymore. The good things about the game, good as they might be, are astronomically outweighed by the games negative development cycle, and the people you will encounter while playing. 

Over the last 2 years, since I've picked up the game, I've watched as the developers trip over themselves, adding killers/survivor perks that outright ruin the experience for the other side, reworking old perks to be "useful" (nice word for annoyingly stupid for the opposite side). The only, ONLY skill in the game is looping. It's the way you waste a killer's time, and the only skill-intensive part of Dead By Daylight. Knowing how to hold M1 on a generator for 80 seconds (which gets old extremely quickly) is NOT a skill. The Behaviour developers have looked at the skill of looping, and taken a shit on it. Killers (Clown, Myers, Trapper/Hag, Spirit, Freddy,  and most recently, the Artist) all have an aspect of themselves that completely neuters looping, without compensating for it in a fun, interactable way.  Whether it be map-wide insta-downing,  no-aim-required slowdown mechanics, or even Trapper and Hag REFUSING to chase in any meaningful way, nearly 50% of the killers in Dead By Daylight are simply unable to be looped. This is no fault of the players; the killers' powers are geared towards preventing a skilled survivor from doing what they got on the game to do in the first place. The emphasis on anti-loop mechanics, and the fact that the developers don't seem to have a problem with that fundamental flaw, shows that this game doesn't have much longer before more people quit.

It's not just survivors either. The killer's goal, as the 1 in the 1v4 dynamic, is to corral and chase survivors, kill survivors, and defend generators. The first 2 goals are unachievable in the game's current state. If a killer wanted to chase and corral a team of 4 decent survivors on communication, they'd need to hook each person 2 times (3rd hook is death, and a 1v3 is much more manageable) for a total of 8 hooks. Because generators only take 80 seconds to do solo, there is no where NEAR enough time for killers to play the game it "should" be played (should is subjective; the way that would be fun to play/watch) The killer has 2 ways of bypassing this in the meta we currently have. The first way is to pick a killer that invalidates loops (check list of anti-loop killers) and get downs fast enough to hook each survivor before the generators are done. The other way is to use the "meta" perks; ones that slow down generators, and regress them, mainly Hex: Ruin, Pop Goes the Weasel, Corrupt Intervention (I could go on for a while, these are the ONLY perks you see at a higher level). The latter of which is the actual solution, since anti-loop killers aren't always the best. They invalidate skill, but not in a way that's fast enough to stop the last 3 survivors from doing generators and escaping. This leads to a choice for the killer; do they pick anti-loop killers, get gen-rushed and lose the game, or do they bring meta perks and force control of the game, making the game less fun for both sides. The choice is pretty shitty, and leads to an awful repetitive mess of the same 3 killers running the same 6 or 7 perks. And it's insanely frustrating, a serious problem for BOTH sides of the coin.

This repetitive, stale game has so many more issues than what I can articulate here. Facecamping, (killer refusing to let you off of the hook once you've been caught)  the fact that certain perks are REQUIRED on survivor in order to NOT GET facecamped, the lengthy grind to get perks on both sides, the grind to get different killers/survivors, some survivor perks being overpowered, some killer perks being overpowered, HORRIBLE community, where 50% of your opponents seem to have it out to make your experience as horrendous as possible, a development team who dont understand the game whatsoever, and refuse to listen to anyone's changes, incorporated NFTs that no one asked for, and are just in general extremely annoying and conceeded. I can't continue to play this game. I tried so hard to make the game fun. I've played without perks to make it more fair for killer, which gets me killed because I can't consistently loop a killer for 5 generators. I've tried playing with meme perks as killer without regression, which ends my games in 4 minutes because I'm not piling on 4 regression perks on the best killer. There's no fun to be had. There's not extra game modes, just hold the generator simulator, and a 5%  chance you'll be able to loop, if your teammates don't all die before you get to chase. It's not fun, it doesn't look visually interesting. There's nothing to do on the game, and both sides have become undeniably frustrating. I won't be proof-reading this, I'm sorry if it was hard-to-read and poorly constructed, but I refuse to think about this game anymore than I already have. It's THAT bad. Please do not waste your money.

This game fucking blows.
